item.title: I-10 West - Exit 93
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 93 - CA-60/Riverside. I-10 continues west towards San Bernardino and Los Angeles. CA-60 parallels I-10 to the south into Los Angeles. Although the sign does not mention it, either route can be used for Los Angeles. An old US-60 shield can be sign peeking out from behind the CA-60 shield.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 93
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 93 - CA-60/Riverside. Use right 3 lanes for I-10 towards San Bernardino and Los Angeles.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 93
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 93 - CA-60/Riverside. Use left lanes for CA-60 exit.

item.title: I-10 West - Next 2 Beaumont Exits
item.description: Next 2 exits on I-10 west in Beaumont: CA-79/Beaumont Ave and Riverside/CA-60.

item.title: CA-60 East Approaching Exits 53AB
item.description: CA-60 east approaching Exit 53A - CA-91/Riverside, and Exit 53B - I-215 North/San Bernardino.

item.title: CA-60 East at Exit 52B and Exits 53AB
item.description: CA-60 east at Main St. Approaching CA-91/Riverside, and I-215 north to San Bernardino. CA-60 and I-215 are multiplexed east through Riverside.

item.title: CA-60 East Exit 41
item.description: CA-60 east at Exit 41 - I-15/Barstow/San Diego

item.title: CA-60 East Exit 50
item.description: CA-60 east at Exit 50 - Rubidoux Blvd.

item.title: CA-60 East Exit 52B
item.description: CA-60 east approaching Exit 52B - Main St. and Exits 53AB CA-91/I-215

item.title: CA-60 East Exit 53B
item.description: CA-60 East/I-215 South at Exit 53B - I-215/CA-60 split. I-215 south to San Diego; CA-60 east to Indio.

item.title: CA-60 East Exit 59
item.description: CA-60 east at Exit 59 - Day St.

item.title: CA-60 East Exit 60
item.description: CA-60 east approaching Exit 60 - Frederick St./Pigeon Pass Road, 1 mile.

item.title: CA-60 East Exit 68
item.description: CA-60 east at Exit 68 - Hemet/San Jacinto exit (Gilman Springs Road).

item.title: CA-60 East Exits 40 and 41
item.description: CA-60 east at Exit 40 - S. Hamner Ave./Milliken Ave. Next exit is Exit 41 - I-15/Barstow/San Diego.

item.title: CA-60 East Exits 53AB
item.description: CA-60 east at Exit 53A - CA-91 South to Riverside and Beach Cities. New control city on CA-60 is Indio.

item.title: CA-60 East Exits 53AB
item.description: CA-60 east at Exit 53A - CA-91 South/Riverside/Beach Cities, and Exit 53B - I-215 North/San Bernardino.

item.title: CA-60 East Exits 53AB and 52B
item.description: CA-60 east approaching Exit 52B - Main St., Exit 53A - CA-91 South/Riverside, and Exit 53B - I-215 North/San Bernardino.

item.title: End CA-60 East at I-10
item.description: End CA-60 at I-10 east in Beaumont.

item.title: I-10 East Exit 94
item.description: I-10 at end of CA-60, at Beaumont exit.

item.title: I-10 West Exit 93
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 93 - CA-60/Riverside, 1/2 mile.

item.title: I-10 West Exit 93
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 93 - CA-60/Riverside. Use right 3 lanes for I-10.

item.description: S. Haven Ave. at CA-60 east freeway entrance.

item.description: S. Haven Ave. at CA-60 west onramp.

item.title: S. Haven Ave. Approaching CA-60
item.description: S. Haven Ave. approaching CA-60, Riverside Fwy, to Riverside and Los Angeles.
